Do you want to delete this book?

language.tran: 密码相同，请重新输入新密码!

智能卡已与其他机顶盒绑定

language.tran: 喂养时间未到，该子卡不能被喂养

节目级别高于设定的观看级别

language.tran: 智能卡与本机顶盒不对应

language.tran: 子卡需要和母卡对应，请插入母卡

tran.id: Card upgrade failed.Please contact the operator

language.tran: 智能卡校验失败，请联系运营商

tran.id: Card in patching. Not to remove the card or power off

language.tran: 智能卡升级中，请不要拔卡或者关机

tran.id: Please do not switch channels too frequently
Card is in dormancy. Please insert the card after 5 minutes

language.tran: 智能卡暂时休眠，请5分钟后重新插卡

tran.id: Card is freezed. Please contact the operator

language.tran: 智能卡已冻结，请联系运营商

tran.id: STB is freezed. Please contact the operator

language.tran: 卡中不存在移植库定制运营商

tran.id: Please send the IPPV records back to the operator

language.tran: 智能卡已暂停，请回传收视记录给运营商

language.tran: 购买后，系统将在观看过程中自动扣费
高级预览节目，该阶段不能免费观看
正在写入数据到智能卡
成功，下一张子卡或退出
初始化安装,卡不可使用
当前节目级别低于家长控制级别

tran.id: [NOTICE]Failed 3 times, the PIN will be locked

language.tran: 【提示】PIN如果连续错误3次，将被锁定

tran.id: Error PIN length, more than 3 times be locked

language.tran: PIN码长度错误,连续超过3次将被锁定

tran.id: Error PIN, more than 3 times be locked

language.tran: PIN码错误,连续超过3次将被锁定

tran.id: The new PIN are not consistent

language.tran: 两次输入的新PIN码不一致

tran.id: Setting fail, hour range 0~23, minute range 0~59

language.tran: 设置失败，小时必须在0~23之前，分钟必须在0~59之间
确认要删除选中的邮件吗？

tran.id: IC card match to other STB

language.tran: 运营商限制观看该节目

tran.id: Daughter card has been limit, associate to master card

language.tran: 此卡为子卡，已经被限制收看，请与母卡配对

tran.id: Money is not enough to watch, recharge please

language.tran: 余额不足，不能观看此节目，请及时充值

tran.id: IPPV program, no pay no watch

language.tran: 此节目为IPPV节目，您没有预订和确认购买，不能观看此节目

tran.id: IPPT program, make sure to buy or not

language.tran: 此节目为IPPT节目，请到IPPT节目确认/取消购买菜单下确认购买此节目

tran.id: IPPT program, no pay no watch

language.tran: 此节目为IPPT节目，您没有预订和确认购买，不能观看此节目

tran.id: IPPV program, money not enough, recharge please

language.tran: 此节目为IPPV节目，余额不足，不能观看，请及时充值

tran.id: IPPT program, money not enough, recharge please

language.tran: 此节目为IPPT节目，余额不足，不能观看，请及时充值

language.tran: 数据无效，STB不做任何提示。卡密钥问题
